function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of new smart/innovative technologies for virus propagation prevention","Impact":"Potential failure or malfunction of new technologies leading to virus spread","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of smart technologies, implementation of redundancy systems","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, thermo-visors for temperature measurement","People":"Residents, occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team"}]}
